about.name: Sandeep Kumar
about: Hello! I am Sandeep Bhardwaj. Full Stack Developer.

Sandeep Kumar is a passionate Full Stack Web Developer and always available to Learn and Teach new WEB Technologies. He has different programming skills such as PHP, MySQL, Wordpress, HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, Bootstrap, JAVASCRIPT, basic knowledge of laravel and Flutter.

basic_info.address: V.P.O. Tikri Distt. Karnal home no. 41

experience.description: Worked as Full stack Developer. Delivered outstanding service to clients to maintain and extend relationship for future business opportunities. Designed, implemented and monitored web pages, plugins and functionality for continuous improvement. Applied latest emerging technology, software and project application trends to update and maintain site applicability. Planned website development, converting mockups into usable web presence with HTML, JavaScript, AJAX and JSON coding. Worked in both HTML and CSS environments, choosing each protocol, where appropriate, for best results.
